response.overview: A short film about the visibilization, sensitization and resignification of the judicial case of Azul Montoro, a trans woman murdered in October 2017 in Cordoba, while exercising sex work. We follow members of ATTTA, who with their active political participation militate in the defense of the rights of the trans, transvestite and transsexual community. We focus particularly on the political action of the members together with the prosecutor and the relatives of Azul that will come the change of charge to femicide being the first time that this charge of "aggravated homicide by gender violence" is granted to a trans woman murdered in Cordoba.
response.title: Cuerpo trans (versado)
